extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     FREN221 or (FREN212 & FREN220).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN335; FREN435 (formerly FREN403).

basic.description: A detailed study of representative Québécois authors since 1965. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests. Given jointly with FREN 435/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le roman québécois de 1965 à nos jours
